name: Through Time and Space (Amy Clare Fontaine)
name_original: Through Time and Space (Amy Clare Fontaine)
description:
You can travel anywhere in time and space in this marvelous machine...but at what cost? Sometimes you don't know what you have until it's gone. Sometimes a single choice changes everything.

Click on a hyperlink to make a choice. Refresh the page to start over. Use the fullscreen button to enter fullscreen mode and the scrollbars to scroll. This short text-based game is designed to run on computer browsers only.
